org.openhubframework.openhub.spi.circuitbreaker

Interface CircuitBreaker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCircuitBreaker, CircuitBreakerHazelcastImpl, CircuitBreakerInMemoryImpl

    public interface CircuitBreaker
    Contract for Circuit Breaker.

    Recommended to be used with CircuitComponent, see its javadoc.

    Usage: 
     .doTry()
   .process(checkCircuitIsOpen())
   .to("external-system")
 .doCatch(CircuitDownException.class)
   .process(fallBackProcessor(if needed, otherwise exception will be thrown))
 .doFinally()
   .process(updateCircuitState())
 .end()

    Configuration:

    • instance of CircuitConfiguration is expected to be set in Exchange property CONFIGURATION_PROPERTY. See CircuitConfiguration for more info.

    Since:
    2.2
    Author:
    Karel Kovarik
    See Also:
    CircuitConfiguration, CircuitDownException

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONFIGURATION_PROPERTY
      Exchange property to store configuration.

    • Field Detail

      • CONFIGURATION_PROPERTY

        static final String CONFIGURATION_PROPERTY
        Exchange property to store configuration.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • checkCircuitIsOpen

        org.apache.camel.Processor checkCircuitIsOpen()
                                       throws CircuitDownException
        Check whether circuit is open. Does nothing if yes, however if circuit is breaked down, it does throw exception.
        Returns:
        processor to check circuit.
        Throws:
        CircuitDownException - if circuit is in shortcut state.

      • updateCircuitState

        org.apache.camel.Processor updateCircuitState()
        Update circuit state. Should be called if service call fail, or if succeeds. Based on exception present, it should decide that call was success or not.
        Returns:
        processor to update circuit state.

      • getCircuitConfiguration

        default CircuitConfiguration getCircuitConfiguration(org.apache.camel.Exchange exchange)
        Get current circuit configuration.
        Parameters:
        exchange - the camel exchange.
        Returns:
        the circuit configuration.
